messages.content: What is ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?
ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD is an implementation of ComfyUI MotionCtrl for SVD, which is a custom node or plugin that extends the functionality of ComfyUI.
How can I install ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?

To install ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD, you need to: 1. Clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of ComfyUI location. 2. Run pip install -r requirements.txt. 3. Download the weights of MotionCtrl for SVD (motionctrl_svd.ckpt) and put it in ComfyUI/models/checkpoints.
Where can I find the base workflow example for ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?
The base workflow example for ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD/blob/main/workflow.json.
What is the purpose of the little exploration workflow in ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?

The little exploration workflow in ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD is used for videos with relatively static camera angles. It applies the same MotionCtrl to each frame, then combines images from corresponding positions to create a new video.
Where can I find the little exploration workflow example for ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?
The little exploration workflow example for ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD/blob/main/workflow_video.json.
Where can I find the original video used in the ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD example?
The original video used in the ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD example can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD/blob/main/assets/original.mp4.
Where can I find the generated video using ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD?
The generated video using ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD/blob/main/assets/svd.mp4.
What is the purpose of the MotionCtrl+SVD examples?
The MotionCtrl+SVD examples showcase how to use ComfyUI-MotionCtrl-SVD to add motion to images by providing detailed configurations for each example.
What was the prompt used to generate the image in example 1?
The prompt used to generate the image in example 1 was 'the great wall sunset --v 6.0 --aspect 16:9'.
What type of motion was applied in example 3?
In example 3, the motion type used was Basic Camera Poses with the Camera setting 'Zoom Out'.
What was the source of the image used in example 7?

The image source for example 7 was from a link: https://image.baidu.com/search/detail?ct=503316480&z=3&ipn=d&word=%E8%BF%AA%E4%B8%BD%E7%83%AD%E5%B7%B4%E5%A3%81%E7%BA%B8&step_word=&hs=0&pn=20&spn=0&di=7264239678495129601&pi=0&rn=1&tn=baiduimagedetail&is=0%2C0&istype=2&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&in=&cl=2&lm=-1&st=-1&cs=3934446908%2C870997472&os=4215917212%2C2884701884&simid=3392066753%2C292439980&adpicid=0&lpn=0&ln=1790&fr=&fmq=1705213712052_R&fm=&ic=&s=undefined&hd=0&latest=0&copyright=0&se=&sme=&tab=0&width=0&height=0&face=undefined&ist=&jit=&cg=&bdtype=0&oriquery=&objurl=http%3A%2F%2Fpic1.win4000.com%2Fwallpaper%2F2019-10-16%2F5da6b9e31f489.jpg&fromurl=ippr_z2C%24qAzdH3FAzdH3Fooo_z%26e3Botg9aaa_z%26e3Bv54AzdH3F45ktsj_1jpwts_8md8l9_n_z%26e3Bip4s&gsm=1e&rpstart=0&rpnum=0&islist=&querylist=&nojc=undefined&dyTabStr=MCwzLDEsMiw2LDQsNSw3LDgsOQ%3D%3D&lid=8666326058004339333.
What was the FPS setting for the motion in example 10?
The FPS setting for the motion in example 10 was 10.
What type of motion was applied in example 12?
In example 12, the motion type used was Custom Camera Poses -- Customized Mode 2: Both A and B with the Camera setting '[Pan Left, Zoom In]'.
What was the prompt used to generate the image in example 14?
The prompt used to generate the image in example 14 was 'fighting spacecraft night, cyperpunk style, future style. --v 6.0 --aspect 16:9'.
What is the purpose of the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo in ComfyUI?
The MotionCtrl_SVD Demo in ComfyUI is a tutorial that demonstrates how to generate videos with customizable camera motions using the Stable Diffusion model.
What should you do if the motion control is not obvious in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
If the motion control is not obvious in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo, you should try increasing the 'Motion Speed'.
What should you do if the generated videos are severely distorted in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
If the generated videos are severely distorted in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo, you should try decreasing the 'Motion Speed' or increasing the 'FPS'.
What are the three levels of complexity for camera motion provided in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
The three levels of complexity for camera motion provided in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo are: Basic Camera Poses, Provided Complex Camera Poses, and Custom Camera Poses.
How many basic camera poses are provided in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
There are 8 basic camera poses provided in the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo.
What are the three sub-modes in the Custom Camera Poses mode of the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
The three sub-modes in the Custom Camera Poses mode of the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo are: Customized Mode 1 (First A then B), Customized Mode 2 (Both A and B), and Customized Mode 3 (RAW Camera Poses).
Where can you find examples with camera settings for the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo?
You can find examples with camera settings for the MotionCtrl_SVD Demo in the showcase_svd section.
